LanguageData.LSE_LaunchSiteTimeoutDaysTooltip: How long should new launch sites remain on the map? 30 days by default to match abandoned camps.
LanguageData.LSE_LandmarkSitesCanExpireLabel: Launch sites on landmarks can expire?
LanguageData.LSE_LandmarkSitesCanExpireTooltip: Can launch sites expire even when located on a landmark? Disabled by default to match abandoned camps.
